title: Praça de São João
body: It was located near Campo da Barca, in the place now called Larguinho de S. João. It was demolished before 1860 and was already considered very old in the early 19th century. It is incorporated into Praça de Tenerife.

Praça de São João: Was located near Campo da Barca, in the place now called Larguinho de S. João, was demolished before 1860, is incorporated into Praça de Tenerife
